'''Red Hot Chili Popsicles''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Memories of the Heart]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to make popsicles out of [[Jueyun Chili]] and [[Slime Condensate]] in ''[[Popsicles and Their Curious Uses#A Curious Mix|A Curious Mix]].''

==Trivia==
* The name of the achievement is most likely a reference to the band {{w|Red Hot Chili Peppers}}.
